rule_name: Virus Trojan_Webshell found on the Web server
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*webshell*)) AND ( (appname:ids) OR (appname:ips) ) AND ( (src_ip:RS_IN('siem_reference_set_data_table_27.C0'  )) OR (dst_ip:RS_IN('siem_reference_set_data_table_27.C0'  )) ) ) | stats count() as count_, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(dst_ip) as dst_ip, values(appname) as appname by src_ip | where ((count_ >= 1))
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "边界安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "病毒木马" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 1 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("ids", "ips", "skyeye", "tdp", "waf", "Webshell", "病毒木马", "边界安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "appname discovers the Web server Webshell event, the source address issrc_ip, and the destination address is dst_ip." | eval rule_name = "Virus Trojan_Webshell found on the Web server"

rule_name: aliyun-访问异常路径
author: pawic
rule: ( (appname:waf) AND (tag:aliyun) AND (request_path:\/.env) ) | stats count() as count_, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(dst_ip) as dst_ip, values(request_path) as request_path, values(request_body) as request_body, values(user_agent) as user_agent, values(action) as action, values(send_byte) as send_byte, values(content_type) as content_type, values(cookie) as cookie, values(referer) as referer, values(X_Forwarded_For) as X_Forwarded_For, values(waf.https) as https, values(waf.querystring) as querystring, values(waf.region) as region, values(src_port) as src_port, values(waf.request_length) as request_length, values(method) as method, values(waf.request_time_msec) as request_time_msec, values(dst_port) as dst_port, values(waf.ssl_cipher) as ssl_cipher, values(waf.ssl_protocol) as ssl_protocol, values(status) as status, values(waf.upstream_addr) as upstream_addr, values(waf.upstream_response_time) as upstream_response_time, values(waf.upstream_status) as upstream_status, values(uri) as uri, values(waf.matched_host) as matched_host, values(domain_name) as domain_name by src_ip | where ((count_ >= 1)) | eval __alert_classify_config__ = "[{\"groupBy\":[\"src_ip\"],\"alertLevels\":[{\"where\":{\"operator_type\":\"logic_and\",\"children\":[{\"operator_type\":\">=\",\"field\":\"count_\",\"value\":1}]},\"alertLevel\":\"mid\"},{\"where\":{\"operator_type\":\"logic_and\",\"children\":[{\"operator_type\":\">=\",\"field\":\"count_\",\"value\":10}]},\"alertLevel\":\"high\"}],\"timeRange\":\"10m\"}]"
extend_rule:
| eval threat_classif = "资产安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 5 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 1 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("waf", "云环境", "资产安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "" + src_ip + "访问" + dst_ip + "敏感路径/.env
执行动作：" + action + "，请求内容类型：" + content_type + "
URL：" + uri + "，域名：" + domain_name + "，请求的来源URL信息：" + referer + "
Cookie：" + cookie + "，user-agent：" + user_agent + "
原始IP地址：" + X_Forwarded_For + "，WAF实例地区：" + region + "（on：国内，int：国外）
是否开启HTTPS：" + https + "
客户端请求匹配到的已接入WAF进行防护的域名：" + matched_host + "
查询字符串：" + querystring + "
请求体：" + request_body + "，请求字节数：" + request_length + "
WAF处理客户端请求所用的时间（秒）：" + request_time_msec + "
状态码：" + status + "，源站服务器响应WAF回源请求的HTTP状态码：" + upstream_status + "
源站服务器响应WAF回源请求的时间与WAF将响应转发给客户端的时间之和：" + upstream_response_time + "
SSL版本：" + ssl_protocol + "，SSL加密算法：" + ssl_cipher | eval rule_name = "aliyun-访问异常路径"

rule_name: 被禁用用户使用 Kerberos 从源进行身份验证失败

rule: ( (appname:host_protect) AND (event_type:malic_opera) ) | stats count(hp.msg.event_level) as count_event_level, values(agent_ip) as dst_ip, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(hp.msg.internal_ip) as internal_ip, values(hp.msg.host_name) as host_name, values(hp.msg.group_name) as group_name, values(hp.msg.external_ip) as external_ip, values(event_level) as event_level, values(uname) as uname, values(tty) as tty, values(rule_name) as rulename, values(process) as process, values(user) as user, values(execute_pname) as execute_pname, values(desc) as description, values(uri) as uri by hp.msg.agent_ip | where ((count_event_level >= 1))
extend_rule:
| eval risk_object = "event_level" | eval threat_classif = "资产安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "" | eval threat_level = 0 | eval threat_stage = 3 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 1 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("host_protect", "资产安全") | eval disposal = "" + uri | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "" + description + "
告警等级：" + event_level + "
目标IP" + dst_ip + " 主机名为" + host_name + "，归属分组：" + group_name + "，内网IP为：" + internal_ip + "
命中的规则名：" + rulename + "
执行命令用户：" + uname + "
登录使用的用户：" + user + "
执行命令进程：" + process + "
实际执行命令进程：" + execute_pname + "
产生命令的登录终端：" + tty | eval rule_name = "青藤云-可疑操作事件"

rule_name: ids-失败后登录成功事件
author: pawic
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "网络安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "" | eval threat_level = 0 | eval threat_stage = 0 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 1 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("ids", "网络安全") | eval pipeline_ids = mvappend("siem870345bd-d800-4811-a958-b1eea087833c") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 1 | eval __issue_merge_strategy__ = 0 | eval __issue_time_window__ = 86400 | eval __issue_config__ = "{\"end_condition\":{\"type\":1,\"max_num\":10},\"pipeline_execution_mode\":1}" | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "来源IP：" + src_ip + "使用账号：" + user + "登录失败" + password + "次,且使用" + dc_password + "个不同的密码尝试登录并登录成功，目的IP：" + dst_ip + "，目的端口：" + dst_port | eval rule_name = "" + app_pro + "-失败后登录成功事件"

rule_name: 青藤云-Agent停用告警
author: pawic
rule: ( (appname:host_protect) AND (tag:unicom) AND (hp.msg.event_type:agent_suspend_check) ) | stats count(hp.msg.event_level) as count_event_level, values(hp.msg.event_level) as event_level, values(hp.msg.platform) as platform, values(hp.msg.internal_ip) as internal_ip, values(hp.msg.host_name) as host_name, values(hp.msg.group_name) as group_name, values(hp.msg.agent_version) as agent_version, values(hp.msg.agent_ip) as src_ip, values(hp.msg.last_suspended_time) as last_suspended_time by hp.msg.agent_ip | where ((count_event_level >= 1))
extend_rule:
| eval risk_object = "event_level" | eval threat_classif = "资产安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "敏感操作" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 3 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 1 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("host_protect", "资产安全", "青藤云") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "发现" + src_ip + "已停用，最近停用时间：" + last_suspended_time + "
告警等级：" + event_level + "
主机名" + host_name + "
主机分组：" + group_name + "
操作系统类型：" + platform + "
内网IP:" + internal_ip | eval rule_name = "青藤云-Agent停用告警"

rule_name: 到非域主机的潜在远程桌面连接

false_alert_desc: 主机连接到有效域，主机连接不使用FQDN的主机，主机到外部合法域的连接。

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "域安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "账户安全" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 4 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("sigma", "Windows", "Security", "内网", "域安全", "账户安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "检测使用 NTLM 登录到可能不属于域的主机。" | eval rule_name = "到非域主机的潜在远程桌面连接"

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "数据安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "口令密码" | eval threat_level = 0 | eval threat_stage = 1 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("dlp", "数据安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "" + src_ip + "在30分钟内出现" + count_ + "次" + event_type + "类型告警" | eval rule_name = "用户短时间触发多个密码泄露告警"

rule_name: 用户短时间触发多种告警

rule_name: T1070 - 未经授权的系统时间修改
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:windows) AND (event_id:4616) AND (NOT ( (subject_user_sid:S-1-5-19) OR (process:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe) OR (process:C\:\\Program\ Files\\VMware\\VMware\ Tools\\vmtoolsd.exe) OR (process:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\VBoxService.exe) OR (process:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\oobe\\msoobe.exe) )) ) | stats count() as count_, values(ip) as src_ip, values(ip) as dst_ip by ip, process | where ((count_ > 0))
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "防御逃逸" | eval extend_threat_classif = "时间戳" | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_stage = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval threat_level = 1 | eval att_ck_stage = 6 | eval ttp_no = "时间戳" | eval ttp_desc = "攻击者可能会修改文件时间属性以隐藏新文件或对现有文件的更改。Timestomping 是一种修改文件时间戳（修改、访问、创建和更改时间）的技术，通常用于模拟同一文件夹中的文件。例如，在被攻击者修改或创建的文件上执行此操作，以使它们对取证调查人员或文件分析工具不显眼。" | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("MITRE_ATTACK", "Windows", "主机安全", "内网", "防御逃逸", "域安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "主机[" + src_ip + "]试图在未授权情况下修改系统时间。" | eval rule_name = "T1070 - 未经授权的系统时间修改"

rule_name: 内网发起扫描的主机外联C2

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "内网安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "主机失陷" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 3 | eval net_flow = 2 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("内网安全", "主机失陷", "内网扫描") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "发起内网扫描的主机" + src_ip + "外联C2服务器" + dst_ip + "。" | eval rule_name = "内网发起扫描的主机外联C2"

rule_name: T1552 - 从敏感文件中获取凭证的可疑行为
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:windows) AND (tag:security) AND (file_name:*findstr.exe*) AND ( (cmd:*for*) OR (cmd:*dir*) OR (cmd:*forfiles*) ) AND ( (cmd:/(^|\\W+)dir(\\.exe)?\\s+.*(\\.txt|\\.js|\\.vbs|\\.bat|\\.py|\\.xml|\\.doc|docx|\\.excel|\\.01|\\.ppt|\\.mdb|\\.sql|\\.mdf|\\.eml|\\.pst|\\.ini|conf|bak|pwd|pass|login|user)($|\\s+)/) OR (cmd:/for\\s+.*in\\s+.*(\\.txt|\\.js|\\.vbs|\\.bat|\\.py|\\.xml|\\.doc|docx|\\.excel|\\.01|\\.ppt|\\.mdb|\\.sql|\\.mdf|\\.eml|\\.pst|\\.ini|conf|bak|pwd|pass|login|user)\\s+.*echo\\s+/) OR (cmd:/(^|\\W+)?findstr(\\.exe)?\\s+.*(pass\\s+|userpwd\\s+|pwd\\s+|login\\s+|user).*/) OR (cmd:/(^|\\W+)forfiles(\\.exe)?\\s+.*(\\.txt|\\.js|\\.vbs|\\.bat|\\.py|\\.xml|\\.doc|docx|\\.excel|\\.01|\\.ppt|\\.mdb|\\.sql|\\.mdf|\\.eml|\\.pst|\\.ini|conf|bak|pwd|pass|login|user)($|\\s+)/) ) ) | fields host, cmd | rename host as host, cmd as cmd
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "凭证访问" | eval extend_threat_classif = "文件中的凭证" | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_stage = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval threat_level = 1 | eval att_ck_stage = 7 | eval ttp_no = "文件中的凭证" | eval ttp_desc = "攻击者可能会在本地文件系统和远程文件共享中搜索包含不安全存储凭据的文件。这些可以是用户创建的用于存储他们自己的凭据的文件、一组个人的共享凭据存储、包含系统或服务密码的配置文件或包含嵌入式密码的源代码/二进制文件。" | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("MITRE_ATTACK", "Windows", "主机安全", "内网", "凭证", "敏感文件", "域安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "主机 [" + host + "] 尝试执行命令： [" + cmd + "] 获取敏感文件中的信息，例如登录凭证。" | eval rule_name = "T1552 - 从敏感文件中获取凭证的可疑行为"

rule_name: The host that initiated the brute force attack on the intranet has a rebound shell alarm
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( ( (appname:nta) OR (appname:ids) OR (appname:ips) OR (appname:skyeye) OR (appname:tdp) OR (appname:waf) ) AND ( (event_name:*暴力破解*) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*brute*force*)) ) ) | stats values(src_ip) as temp_field0_2744a03, count() as _total1_ by src_ip | where _total1_ >= 1 | rename src_ip as join_field0_71148d4, temp_field0_2744a03 as src_ip| join type=inner join_field0_71148d4 [[( ( (appname:nta) OR (appname:ids) OR (appname:ips) OR (appname:skyeye) OR (appname:tdp) OR (appname:waf) ) AND ( (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*反弹shell*)) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*reverse*shell*)) ) AND (dst.geo.country:private) ) | stats values(dst_ip) as temp_field0_86d4b44, values(src_ip) as victim, count() as _total2_ by dst_ip | where _total2_ >= 1 | rename dst_ip as join_field0_71148d4, temp_field0_86d4b44 as dst_ip ]]
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "内网安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "主机失陷" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 4 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("主机失陷", "内网安全", "暴力破解") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "The host" + src_ip + " that initiates intranet brute force cracking has a rebound shell alarm." | eval rule_name = "The host that initiated the brute force attack on the intranet has a rebound shell alarm"

rule_name: TOPTVD detects the source address of the external network to try to exploit the vulnerability
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:toptvd) AND (NOT ( (src_ip:RS_CIDR('siem_reference_set_data_table_492.C0'  )) OR (toptvd.msg:HTTP明文密码) )) AND (event_type:attack) ) | stats distinct_count(desc) as distinct_count_desc, values(dst_ip) as dst_ip, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(desc) as msg, values(ids.sgeo) as sgeo by src_ip | where ((distinct_count_desc >= 2)) | eval device = "toptvd" | eval alert_name = "漏洞利用尝试"
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "边界安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "漏洞探测" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 2 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("toptvd", "漏洞扫描", "边界安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "The malicious source address " + src_ip + " from " + sgeo + " sends " + msg + " to the destination address " + dst_ip | eval rule_name = "toptvd detects the same external network source address for multiple vulnerability attempts"

rule_name: Suspicious compromised hosts initiate brute force attacks on intranet hosts
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( ( (appname:nta) OR (appname:ids) OR (appname:ips) OR (appname:skyeye) OR (appname:tdp) OR (appname:waf) ) AND ( (event_name:*命令执行*) OR (event_name:*文件上传*) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*webshell*)) OR (event_name:*代码执行*) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*code*execution*)) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*command*execution*)) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*file*upload*)) ) ) | stats values(src_ip) as src_ip, count() as _total1_ by dst_ip | where _total1_ >= 1 | rename dst_ip as join_field0_7a64bc7| join type=inner join_field0_7a64bc7 [[( ( (appname:nta) OR (appname:ids) OR (appname:ips) OR (appname:skyeye) OR (appname:tdp) OR (appname:waf) ) AND ( (event_name:*暴力破解*) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*brute*force*)) ) AND (dst.geo.country:private) ) | stats values(dst_ip) as dst_ip, values(src_ip) as victim, count() as _total2_ by src_ip | where _total2_ >= 1 | rename src_ip as join_field0_7a64bc7 ]]
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "内网安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "内网扫描" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 4 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("主机失陷", "内网安全", "内网扫描") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "After the source address src_ip attacks the host victim, thevictim launches a brute force cracking attack to other intranet hostdst_ip." | eval rule_name = "Suspicious compromised hosts initiate brute force attacks on intranet hosts"

rule_name: T1555 - 高权限帐户的 NTLM 身份验证
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:windows) AND (event_id:4776) AND (event_status:0x0) AND (target_user:RS_IN('siem_reference_set_data_table_381.C0'  )) AND (NOT (workstation_name:RS_IN('siem_reference_set_data_table_426.C0'  ))) ) | stats count() as count_, values(ip) as src_ip, values(ip) as dst_ip, values(target_user) as user by ip, target_user, workstation_name | where ((count_ > 0))
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "凭证访问" | eval extend_threat_classif = "Windows凭证管理器" | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_stage = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval threat_level = 2 | eval att_ck_stage = 7 | eval ttp_no = "Windows凭证管理器" | eval ttp_desc = "攻击者可能会从 Windows 凭据管理器获取凭据。Credential Manager 将用于登录网站、应用程序或通过 NTLM 或 Kerberos 请求身份验证的设备的凭据存储在 Credential Lockers（以前称为 Windows Vaults）中。" | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("MITRE_ATTACK", "Windows", "凭证", "高权帐号", "凭证访问", "内网", "域安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "主机 [" + ip + "] 尝试对非域控用户外的高权限账户 [" + target_user + "] 执行NTLM身份认证。" | eval rule_name = "T1555 - 高权限帐户的 NTLM 身份验证"

rule_name: 青藤云-内网暴力破解事件
author: pawic
rule: ( (appname:host_protect) AND (tag:qingteng) AND (event_type:bruteforce_inter) ) | stats count(hp.msg.agent_ip) as count_agent_ip, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(agent_ip) as dst_ip, values(hp.msg.host_name) as host_name, values(desc) as msg, values(uri) as uri, values(event_level) as event_level, values(hp.msg.group_name) as group_name, values(uname) as user, values(hp.msg.detail_block_time) as detail_block_time, values(hp.msg.reason_mean) as reason_mean, values(event_name) as event_name by src_ip | where ((count_agent_ip >= 1)) | eval __alert_classify_config__ = "[{\"groupBy\":[\"src_ip\"],\"alertLevels\":[{\"where\":{\"operator_type\":\"logic_and\",\"children\":[{\"operator_type\":\">=\",\"field\":\"count_agent_ip\",\"value\":1}]},\"alertLevel\":\"low\"},{\"where\":{\"operator_type\":\"logic_and\",\"children\":[{\"operator_type\":\">=\",\"field\":\"count_agent_ip\",\"value\":9}]},\"alertLevel\":\"mid\"}],\"timeRange\":\"10m\"}]"
extend_rule:
| eval risk_object = "event_level" | eval threat_classif = "资产安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "内网暴力破解" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 5 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 1 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("host_protect", "资产安全") | eval disposal = "" + uri | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "" + msg + "
" + dst_ip + "主机名" + host_name + "，所属分组：" + group_name + "
告警等级：" + event_level + "
被爆破的账号名：" + user + "
封停时长：" + detail_block_time + "
封停原因：" + reason_mean | eval rule_name = "青藤云检测" + event_name + "事件"

rule_name: WAF-频繁错误状态码
author: pawic
rule: ( (appname:waf) AND (status:*40**) AND (tag:aliyun) ) | stats count(src_ip) as count_src_ip, values(uri) as uri, values(request_body) as request_body, values(dst_ip) as dst_ip, values(domain_name) as domain_name, values(referer) as referer, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(dst_port) as dst_port, values(src_port) as src_port, values(user_agent) as user_agent, values(X_Forwarded_For) as X_Forwarded_For, values(https) as https, values(matched_host) as matched_host, values(querystring) as querystring, values(region) as region, values(request_length) as request_length, values(method) as method, values(request_path) as request_path, values(request_time_msec) as request_time_msec, values(proto) as proto, values(ssl_protocol) as ssl_protocol, values(ssl_cipher) as ssl_cipher, values(upstream_status) as upstream_status, values(response_time) as response_time, first(status) as status, values(action) as action, values(content_type) as content_type, values(cookie) as cookie by status | where ((count_src_ip >= 1)) | eval __alert_classify_config__ = "[{\"groupBy\":[\"status\"],\"alertLevels\":[{\"where\":{\"operator_type\":\"logic_and\",\"children\":[{\"operator_type\":\">\",\"field\":\"count_src_ip\",\"value\":10}]},\"alertLevel\":\"mid\"},{\"where\":{\"operator_type\":\"logic_and\",\"children\":[{\"operator_type\":\">\",\"field\":\"count_src_ip\",\"value\":20}]},\"alertLevel\":\"high\"}],\"timeRange\":\"30m\"}]"
extend_rule:
| eval threat_classif = "资产安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "Web扫描" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 0 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 1 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("waf", "资产安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "源地址" + src_ip + "访问" + dst_ip + "触发" + count_src_ip + "次错误，状态码：" + status + "，源站服务器响应WAF回源请求的HTTP状态码：" + upstream_status + "
执行动作：" + action + "，请求内容类型：" + content_type + "，URL：" + uri + "，域名：" + domain_name + "，客户端请求匹配到的已接入WAF进行防护的域名：" + matched_host + "
请求的来源URL信息：" + referer + "，请求方法：" + method + "，协议：" + proto + "
Cookie：" + cookie + "
user-agent：" + user_agent + "
原始IP地址：" + X_Forwarded_For + "，WAF实例地区：" + region + "（on：国内，int：国外）是否开启HTTPS：" + https + "
查询字符串：" + querystring + "，请求体：" + request_body + "，请求字节数：" + request_length + "
WAF处理客户端请求所用的时间（秒）：" + request_time_msec + "，源站服务器响应WAF回源请求的时间与WAF将响应转发给客户端的时间之和：" + response_time + "
SSL版本：" + ssl_protocol + "，SSL加密算法：" + ssl_cipher | eval rule_name = "阿里云WAF" + status + "事件"

rule_name: 疑似SQL注入攻击_请求体包含多个SQL关键字

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "资产安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "SQL注入" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 2 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("SQL注入", "waf", "资产安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "源地址" + src_ip + "请求" + uri + " 的请求体中包含可疑的SQL关键字" + word + "，请求体为" + request_body + "。" | eval rule_name = "疑似SQL注入攻击_请求体包含SQL关键字"

author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:toptvd) AND (NOT (src_ip:RS_CIDR('siem_reference_set_data_table_492.C0'  ))) AND (event_type:attack) ) | stats count(desc) as count_desc, values(dst_ip) as dst_ip, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(desc) as msg, values(ids.sgeo) as sgeo by src_ip, desc | where ((count_desc >= 10))
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "边界安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "漏洞探测" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 2 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("toptvd", "漏洞扫描", "边界安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "The malicious source address " + src_ip + " from " + sgeo + " sends " + msg + " to the destination address " + dst_ip | eval rule_name = "toptvd detects multiple attempts of the same external network source address for the same vulnerability"

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "数据安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "数据泄露" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 5 | eval net_flow = 2 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("dlp", "数据安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "源地址为" + src_ip + "的用户" + dlp.SENDER + "向目的地址为" + dst_ip + "的用户" + dlp.RECIPIENTS + "发送了主题为" + SUBJECT + "，带有文件" + FileName + "的邮件，触发了策略" + PolicyName + "。" | eval rule_name = "数据泄露_外发邮件包含敏感信息"

rule_name: Suspicious compromised hosts initiate scans for intranet hosts
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( ( (appname:nta) OR (appname:ids) OR (appname:ips) OR (appname:skyeye) OR (appname:tdp) OR (appname:waf) ) AND ( (event_name:*命令执行*) OR (event_name:*文件上传*) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*webshell*)) OR (event_name:*代码执行*) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*code*execution*)) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*command*execution*)) OR (event_name:IGNORE_CASE(*file*upload*)) ) ) | stats values(src_ip) as src_ip, count() as _total1_ by dst_ip | where _total1_ >= 1 | rename dst_ip as join_field0_dd34b40| join type=inner join_field0_dd34b40 [[( ( (appname:nta) OR (appname:ids) OR (appname:ips) OR (appname:skyeye) OR (appname:tdp) OR (appname:waf) ) AND ( (event_name:*扫描*) OR (event_name:*scan*) ) AND (dst.geo.country:private) ) | stats values(dst_ip) as dst_ip, values(src_ip) as victim, count() as _total2_ by src_ip | where _total2_ >= 1 | rename src_ip as join_field0_dd34b40 ]]
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "内网安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "内网扫描" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 4 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("主机失陷", "内网安全", "内网扫描") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "After the source address " + src_ip + " attacks the host " + victim + ", the " + victim + " initiates scanning behavior to other intranet hosts " + dst_ip + "." | eval rule_name = "Suspicious compromised hosts initiate scans for intranet hosts"

rule_name: 内网端口扫描_探测同一地址的多个端口

rule_name: Vulnerability Exploitation_Triggering Common High-Risk Vulnerabilities Multiple Times
author: Rizhiyi Security Team

rule_name: T1550.002-尝试进行哈希传递
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:windows) AND (tag:security) AND (event_id:4624) AND ( ( (logontype:9) AND (logon_process:seclogo) AND (auth_package_name:Negotiate) ) OR ( (subject_user_sid:S-1-0-0) AND (logontype:3) AND (logon_process:*NtLmSsp*) AND (json.event_data.KeyLength:0) ) OR ( (logontype:9) AND (logon_process:seclogo) AND (NOT (subject_user:ANONYMOUS\ LOGON)) ) ) AND (NOT (subject_user:\-)) ) | fields subject_user, src_ip, logontype, logon_process | rename subject_user as user, src_ip as src_ip, logontype as logontype, logon_process as logon_process
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "横向移动" | eval extend_threat_classif = "哈希传递" | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_stage = 4 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval threat_level = 2 | eval att_ck_stage = 9 | eval ttp_no = "哈希传递" | eval ttp_desc = "攻击者可以利用偷来的密码散列值在一个环境中横向移动，绕过正常的系统访问控制。传递哈希值（PtH）是一种在无法获得用户的明文密码的情况下对用户进行认证的方法。这种方法绕过了需要明文密码的标准认证步骤，直接进入使用密码散列的认证部分。" | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("MITRE_ATTACK", "Security", "Windows", "主机安全", "内网", "凭证", "哈希传递", "横向移动", "域安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "主机" + src_ip + "使用帐户" + user + "登录，登录类型为：" + logontype + "和 登录进程名为：" + logon_process + "，这可能会尝试传递哈希。" | eval rule_name = "T1550.002-尝试进行哈希传递"

rule_name: T1110 - 使用 Kerberos 协议的密码喷洒

rule: ( (appname:windows) AND ( (event_id:4768) OR (event_id:4771) ) AND (NOT (status:0x0)) AND (service:krbtgt) ) | stats distinct_count(target_user) as distinct_count_target_user, values(target_user) as user by src_ip | where ((distinct_count_target_user > 10))

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "内网安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "主机失陷" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 4 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("主机失陷", "内网安全", "内网扫描") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "A rebound shell event occurred on the host src_ip that initiated the intranet scan." | eval rule_name = "The host that initiated the scan on the intranet has a rebound shell alarm"

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "资产安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "命令注入" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 0 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("waf", "命令注入", "资产安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "源地址" + src_ip + "请求" + uri + "的请求体中包含" + distinct_count_keyword + "个命令注入关键字" + keyword + "，请求体内容为" + request_body | eval rule_name = "疑似命令注入攻击_请求体包含多个命令注入关键字"

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "网络安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 0 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 1 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("ids", "网络安全") | eval pipeline_ids = mvappend("siem870345bd-d800-4811-a958-b1eea087833c") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "源IP" + src_ip + "扫描目的IP" + dst_ip + "超过" + distinct_count_dst_port + "个不同端口" + dst_port | eval rule_name = "外网短时间扫描内网多个端口"

rule_name: 青藤云-外网暴力破解事件

rule: ( (appname:host_protect) AND (tag:qingteng) AND ( (event_type:bruteforce_ext) OR (event_type:bruteforce_inter) ) ) | stats count() as count_, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(agent_ip) as dst_ip, values(hp.msg.host_name) as host_name, values(desc) as msg, values(uri) as uri, values(event_level) as event_level, values(hp.msg.group_name) as group_name, values(uname) as user, values(hp.msg.detail_block_time) as detail_block_time, values(hp.msg.reason_mean) as reason_mean, values(event_name) as event_name by src_ip | where ((count_ >= 1)) | eval __alert_classify_config__ = "[{\"groupBy\":[\"src_ip\"],\"alertLevels\":[{\"where\":{\"operator_type\":\"logic_and\",\"children\":[{\"operator_type\":\">=\",\"field\":\"count_\",\"value\":1}]},\"alertLevel\":\"low\"},{\"where\":{\"operator_type\":\"logic_and\",\"children\":[{\"operator_type\":\">=\",\"field\":\"count_\",\"value\":9}]},\"alertLevel\":\"mid\"}],\"timeRange\":\"10m\"}]"
extend_rule:
| eval risk_object = "event_level" | eval threat_classif = "资产安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "内网暴力破解" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 5 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 1 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("host_protect", "资产安全") | eval disposal = "" + uri | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "" + msg + "
" + dst_ip + "主机名" + host_name + "，所属分组：" + group_name + "
告警等级：" + event_level + "
被爆破的账号名：" + user + "
封停时长：" + detail_block_time + "
封停原因：" + reason_mean | eval rule_name = "青藤云检测" + event_name + "事件"

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "边界安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "反弹Shell" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 2 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("ids", "ips", "skyeye", "tdp", "关联", "反弹Shell", "边界安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "The source address " + src_ip + " attacks " + dst_ip + " to trigger a high-risk alarm " + event_name + ", and a rebound Shell event occurs. The attacker may have successfully exploited the vulnerability to gain control of the host." | eval rule_name = "Rebound Shell_A rebound Shell event occurs on the attacked host"

rule_name: T1482 - 枚举AD CS证书信息
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:windows) AND (event_id:4624) AND (logontype:3) ) | stats values(src_ip) as src, count() as _total1_ by src_ip, target_user | where _total1_ >= 1 | rename src_ip as join_field0_e494932, target_user as join_field1_736497b| join type=inner join_field0_e494932, join_field1_736497b [[( (appname:windows) AND (event_id:5140) AND (sharename:*IPC$*) ) | stats values(target_user) as user, count() as _total2_ by src_ip, target_user | where _total2_ >= 1 | rename src_ip as join_field0_e494932, target_user as join_field1_736497b ]]
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "内网发现" | eval extend_threat_classif = "域信任发现" | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_stage = 0 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval threat_level = 1 | eval att_ck_stage = 8 | eval ttp_no = "域信任发现" | eval ttp_desc = "攻击者可能会尝试收集有关域信任关系的信息，这些信息可用于识别 Windows 多域环境中的横向移动机会。域信任为域提供了一种机制，允许基于另一个域的身份验证访问资源。域信任允许受信任域的用户访问信任域中的资源。发现的信息可能有助于攻击者进行SID-History Injection、Pass the Ticket和Kerberoasting。域信任可以通过DSEnumerateDomainTrusts()Win32 API 调用、.NET 方法和 LDAP 枚举。Windows 实用程序Nltest已知被攻击者用来枚举域信任。" | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("MITRE_ATTACK", "Windows", "Security", "凭证", "内网", "域安全", "信息探测") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "主机[" + src + "]试图枚举AD证书信息。" | eval rule_name = "T1482 - 枚举AD CS证书信息"

extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "权限提升" | eval extend_threat_classif = "组策略修改" | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_stage = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval threat_level = 2 | eval att_ck_stage = 5 | eval ttp_no = "组策略修改" | eval ttp_desc = "攻击者可能会修改组策略对象 (GPO) 以破坏域的预期自主访问控制，通常是为了提升域的权限。组策略允许集中管理 Active Directory (AD) 中的用户和计算机设置。GPO 是组策略设置的容器，由存储在可预测网络路径中的文件组成\\<DOMAIN>\\SYSVOL\\<DOMAIN>\\Policies\\。" | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("MITRE_ATTACK", "Windows", "内网", "域安全", "提升权限") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "主机 [" + host + "] 尝试将普通域用户 [" + user + "] 添加到特权组 [" + ObjectDN + "]。" | eval rule_name = "T1484 - 普通域用户提升为权限帐户组"

rule_name: 青藤云-主机感染病毒后发起暴力破解
author: pawic
rule: ( (appname:host_protect) AND (tag:qingteng) AND ( (event_type:bruteforce_ext) OR (event_type:bruteforce_inter) ) AND (hp.msg.agent_ip:RS_IN('siem_reference_set_data_table_12.C0'  )) ) | stats count(hp.msg.agent_ip) as count_agent_ip, values(src_ip) as src_ip, values(hp.msg.agent_ip) as dst_ip, values(hp.msg.host_name) as host_name, values(desc) as msg, values(uri) as uri, values(event_level) as event_level, values(hp.msg.group_name) as group_name, values(uname) as user, values(hp.msg.detail_block_time) as detail_block_time, values(hp.msg.reason_mean) as reason_mean, values(hp.msg.event_name) as event_name by src_ip | where ((count_agent_ip >= 1))
extend_rule:
| eval risk_object = "event_level" | eval threat_classif = "资产安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "木马病毒" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 4 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 1 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("host_protect", "资产安全") | eval disposal = "" + uri | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "" + msg + "
" + dst_ip + "主机名" + host_name + "，所属分组：" + group_name + "
告警等级：" + event_level + "
被爆破的账号名：" + user + "
封停时长：" + detail_block_time + "
封停原因：" + event_name | eval rule_name = "青藤云检测主机感染病毒后发起" + event_name

rule_name: After Qingteng Cloud discovered that it was infected with a Linux virus, it launched a brute force attack on the intranet
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:host_protect) AND (tag:qingteng) AND (event_type:bruteforce_inter) AND (src_ip:RS_IN('siem_reference_set_data_table_12.C0'  )) ) | fields src_ip, agent_ip, login_user, description | rename src_ip as src_ip, agent_ip as dst_ip, login_user as user, description as description | eval mitrestage = "横向移动"
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "边界安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "木马病毒" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 4 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("host_protect", "SIEM", "边界安全", "青藤云") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "After src_ip is infected with a Linux virus, the user account of dst_ip is violently cracked. Please check whether the IP is abnormal for further processing." | eval rule_name = "After Qingteng Cloud discovered that it was infected with a Linux virus, it launched a brute force attack on the intranet"

rule_name: T1558-获取高权限账号ST票证
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:windows) AND (event_id:4769) AND (status:0x0) AND (NOT (src_port:0)) AND (target_user:RS_IN('siem_reference_set_data_table_381.C0'  )) ) | stats count() as count_, values(target_user) as user by src_ip | where ((count_ > 0))
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "凭证访问" | eval extend_threat_classif = "白银票据" | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_stage = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval threat_level = 2 | eval att_ck_stage = 7 | eval ttp_no = "白银票据" | eval ttp_desc = "拥有目标服务帐户（例如 SharePoint、MSSQL）的密码哈希的攻击者可能会伪造 Kerberos 票证作为服务 (TGS) 票证，也称为白银票据。Kerberos TGS 票证也称为服务票证。" | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("MITRE_ATTACK", "Windows", "域安全", "内网", "凭证", "票据") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "主机 [" + src_ip + "] 尝试获取高权限帐号[" + user + "]ST票证。" | eval rule_name = "T1558-获取高权限账号ST票证"

rule_name: Guacamole两个用户异常共享会话
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:linux) AND (raw_message:"\(2\ users\ now\ present\)") ) | fields ip | rename ip as src_ip | eval dst_ip = src_ip
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "主机安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "异常会话" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 5 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("Linux", "可疑命令", "信息收集") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "检测到存在两个用户的可疑会话" | eval rule_name = "Guacamole两个用户异常共享会话"

rule_name: 文件和目录探测
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:linux) AND ( ( (process_path:*\/file) AND (cmd:/(.){200,}/) ) OR ( (process_path:*\/ls) AND (cmd:*\-R*) ) OR (process_path:*\/find) OR (process_path:*\/tree) ) ) | fields ip | rename ip as src_ip | eval dst_ip = src_ip
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "主机安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "信息探测" | eval threat_level = 0 | eval threat_stage = 0 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("Linux", "可疑命令", "信息收集") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "检测系统实用程序的使用情况以发现文件和目录" | eval rule_name = "文件和目录探测"

rule_name: 可疑文件夹中的程序执行
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (event_type:SYSCALL) AND ( (linux.exe:\/tmp\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/var\/www\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/home\/*\/public_html\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/usr\/local\/apache2\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/usr\/local\/httpd\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/var\/apache\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/srv\/www\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/home\/httpd\/html\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/srv\/http\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/usr\/share\/nginx\/html\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/var\/lib\/pgsql\/data\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/usr\/local\/mysql\/data\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/var\/lib\/mysql\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/var\/vsftpd\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/etc\/bind\/*) OR (linux.exe:\/var\/named\/*) ) AND (NOT (linux.exe:\/var\/www\/.dylan\/bin\/python2)) ) | fields hostname, linux.exe | rename hostname as src_ip, linux.exe as exe | eval dst_ip = src_ip
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "主机安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "进程执行" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 5 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("Linux", "Audit", "防御规避", "命令执行") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "检测与恶意软件或黑客活动相关的可疑非程序文件夹中的程序执行，程序为：" + exe | eval rule_name = "可疑文件夹中的程序执行"

rule_name: Vulnerability scanning_ids triggers multiple vulnerability exploit alarms and there are successful events
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:ids) AND (event_level:*) AND (event_type:attack) ) | stats count(src_ip) as cnt, count() as _total1_ by src_ip | where _total1_ >= 5 | rename src_ip as join_field0_c344837| join type=inner join_field0_c344837 [[( (appname:ids) AND (event_level:*) AND (event_type:attack) AND ( (ids.index:<300) AND (ids.index:>0) ) ) | stats values(src_ip) as temp_field0_0e1486f, values(dst_ip) as dst_ip, values(msg) as msg, count() as _total2_ by src_ip | where _total2_ >= 1 | rename src_ip as join_field0_c344837, temp_field0_0e1486f as src_ip ]]
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "边界安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "漏洞扫描" | eval threat_level = 1 | eval threat_stage = 2 | eval net_flow = 1 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("ids", "ips", "关联", "漏洞扫描", "边界安全") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "The source address " + src_ip + " triggers the exploit alarm " + cnt + " times, among which there are successful events, the destination address is " + dst_ip + ", and the event name is " + msg | eval rule_name = "ids trigger multiple vulnerability exploit alerts and there are success events"

rule_name: 从非机器帐户复制 Active Directory
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( ( (appname:windows) AND (tag:security) ) AND ( (event_id:4662) AND (accessmark:0x100) AND ( (properties:*1131f6aa\-9c07\-11d1\-f79f\-00c04fc2dcd2*) OR (properties:*1131f6ad\-9c07\-11d1\-f79f\-00c04fc2dcd2*) OR (properties:*89e95b76\-444d\-4c62\-991a\-0facbeda640c*) ) ) AND (NOT ( (subject_user:*$) OR (subject_user:MSOL_*) )) ) | fields ip | rename ip as src_ip | eval dst_ip = src_ip
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "域安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "凭证访问" | eval threat_level = 2 | eval threat_stage = 4 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("sigma", "Windows", "Security", "内网", "域安全", "凭证访问", "DCSync") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "检测来自非计算机帐户的潜在滥用 Active Directory 复制服务 (ADRS) 以请求凭据。" | eval rule_name = "从非机器帐户复制 Active Directory"

rule_name: 进程发现
author: Rizhiyi Security Team
rule: ( (appname:linux) AND ( (process_path:*\/ps) OR (process_path:*\/top) ) ) | fields ip | rename ip as src_ip | eval dst_ip = src_ip
extend_rule: | eval threat_classif = "主机安全" | eval extend_threat_classif = "可疑进程" | eval threat_level = 0 | eval threat_stage = 5 | eval net_flow = 3 | eval threat_state = 0 | eval __inner_alert__ = 0 | eval __inner_event__ = 0 | eval __create_case__ = 0 | eval __alert_tag__ = mvappend("Linux", "实施攻击", "可疑命令") | eval __issue_merge_open__ = 0 | eval threat_type = 0 | eval desc = "检测进程发现命令。攻击者可能会尝试获取有关在系统上运行的进程的信息。" | eval rule_name = "进程发现"
